name: Dark Solstice -  2.5D multiplayer online RPG
blurb: Dark Solstice will feature an immersive storyline that shapes the game world based on actions by the playerbase.

rewards.reward: A very heartfelt thank you email.  We will also add your name in the credits as a supporter!

Access to Alpha Testing and message board community, message board community recognition, and a special icon for your in-game character screen to show you are a supporter.  Includes rewards from previous category.
Special access to in-game shop that sells specialty items at marked down prices, along with rewards from previous categories.
Access to the "Forgotten Caverns". - Access to the caverns will only be made available to Kickstarter supporters.

Key to the City - Special access to key vendor that will allow you to unlock any locked doors or containers in the game.  Also includes rewards from previous categories.  - Excludes doors of player owned cities, towns, and homes.
We're offering a lifetime subscription, for $50 to 100 people!   This offer is limited to 100 people.  Also includes rewards from previous categories
Potion Master 9000 for all of your character homes.  The Potion Master 9000 produces/grows several potion ingredients per day, not easily found in the game world.  (Limited to main account.)

The Divine Intervention Chest - From time to time this chest will appear in your home, filled with gifts from the gods.  Gifts range from rare weapons and armor to hard to find jewelry.  This chest can also contain rare supplies or extremely rare artifacts that are needed to find and unlock the GENESIS.  Items spawned are at random and based off the treasure pool connected to this chest.  Also includes rewards from previous categories.
Kaithro's Workbench for all of your character homes.  Kaithro's Workbench produces several hard to find ingredients per day.  \r\n(Limited to main account.)
Game Master Teleport - Ability to teleport to any location within the game, at any time.  Also includes rewards from previous categories. - Excludes teleporting in to player homes.
Play as a Goblin monster!  That's right, 1 of your selected characters will be transformed into a Goblin.  This will only be offered for this Kickstarter program and will never be offered again!
Home upgrade for all characters on account to 4 rooms and home exit placed in protected town. ( Includes home theme pack 1 - The Basics. )  \r\nAlso includes rewards from previous categories.

Special in-game home upgrade for all characters on account. Home upgrade to 6 rooms, 1 garden/farming area, home exit placed in protected town. ( Includes home theme pack 2 - Look at me! )  Also includes rewards from previous categories. (Excludes the $200 reward.)

Grand in-game housing upgrade for all characters on account.  Home upgrade to 8 rooms, 2 garden/farming areas, home exit to be placed in protected city. ( Includes home theme pack 3 - Movin' on up!)   Also includes rewards from previous categories. - (Excludes the $200 and $300 rewards.)

Your own in-game plot of land!  Limited to 9 exterior screens in the game world and 5 interior screens. (14 screens total).  You will work directly with world designers to design, plan, and place what goes on your plot of land and where!  Your home may also be placed here. \r\nExcludes $200 and $300 rewards.  All characters on account my also live here.  Includes lifetime subscription.  \r\n(Placement excludes locations inside cities/towns or areas with buildings already constructed.)

Mayor for life!  
Become the owner of your own city in Dark Solstice.  You will interact directly with world designers, map out your city location, and have it constructed to your specifications.  Have a statue of your character raised in the city center so people never forget your greatness!  Enjoy monetary returns from the Auditors that roam your city collecting taxes from the shopkeepers.  Decide what shops and items your city will sell and what your shopkeepers will talk about.  Select the temple(s) you want in your city and which god you will show devotion to.  Host festivals/events in your city with the help of game staff.  Pilfer your city warehouses and use the goods as you see fit.  Tired of the public roaming your streets?  Close and lock your city gates!  Have your friends invited to live in your city!  And much, much more!  Limited to 25 screens in the game world for exterior, and 25 interior rooms (50 rooms total).  Ongoing city support provided for the life of your account. Includes lifetime subscription.  All characters on account may live in this city. - Excludes the $1,500, $400, $300, and $200 rewards.
                                                                          
(Please contact me with questions before pledging this amount.)
